import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import { leaveFunctions } from "./leaveMainFunction"; import $ from "jquery"; import "jquery-ui/ui/widgets/datepicker"; import "jquery-ui/themes/base/all.css"; const LeaveMain = () => { const [blockedDates, setBlockedDates] = useState([ "2023-05-15", "2023-05-20", "2023-05-25", ]); const [userData, setUserData] = useState([]); const [agmUnit, setAgmUnit] = useState(""); const [dgmUnit, setDgmUnit] = useState(""); const [serviceUnit, setServiceUnit] = useState(""); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { refreshList(); setupDatePicker(); const report = document.getElementById("medicalFile"); const priorlist = document.getElementById("priorDateList"); const leavelist = document.getElementById("leaveDateList"); const lieuPanel = document.getElementById("lieuPanel"); priorlist.style.display = "none"; lieuPanel.style.display = "none"; leavelist.style.display = "none"; report.disabled = true; // Clean up the component return () => { // Perform any cleanup or unsubscribe functions here }; }, []); const refreshList = () => { // Implement your refresh logic here }; const setupDatePicker = () => { const datePickerOptions = { beforeShowDay: function (date) { const formattedDate = $.datepicker.formatDate("yy-mm-dd", date); const isBlocked = blockedDates.includes(formattedDate); const currentDate = new Date().setHours(0, 0, 0, 0); const isDisabled = date.getTime() < currentDate; return [!isBlocked && !isDisabled]; }, // Other datepicker options... }; $("#fromDate").datepicker(datePickerOptions); $("#toDate").datepicker(datePickerOptions); }; const formatDate = (date) => { const year = date.getFullYear(); const month = String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, "0"); const day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, "0"); return year + "-" + month + "-" + day; }; return (
